general.headline: Black Hills Corp. and NorthWestern Energy to Combine in All-Stock Merger to Create a Premier Regional Regulated Electric and Natural Gas Utility Company - NorthWestern Energy Group  ( NASDAQ:NWE ) , Black Hills  ( NYSE:BKH )
general.summary: Increased scale and business line diversity to result in a stronger, more resilient platform to safely, reliably, and cost-effectively meet customers' rising energy needs Merger expected to be accretive to each company's EPS in the first year following the close of transaction

general.headline: Short Seller Andrew Left Says 'OpenAI At $500 Billion Puts Palantir At $40' - And That's Generous - Invesco QQQ Trust, Series 1  ( NASDAQ:QQQ ) , Palantir Technologies  ( NASDAQ:PLTR )
general.summary: Renowned short-seller Andrew Left's Citron Research has issued a bearish report on Palantir Technologies Inc. PLTR, arguing the stock is significantly overvalued and its price is "detached from fundamentals and analysis".
